name: geometra-webapp
description: Gestionale completo per studio geometra con AI integrata

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.prisma:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.prisma:seed: cd backend && npx prisma db seed
scripts.prisma:reset: cd backend && npx prisma migrate reset
scripts.setup:dev: npm run install:all && npm run docker:db && npm run prisma:migrate && npm run prisma:seed

author: Developer
